public class Main
{
  
 public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
{  
        try{
        java.io.BufferedReader br= new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.InputStreamReader(System.in));
        java.io.PrintWriter p=new java.io.PrintWriter(System.out);
        int s= Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
        Main obj=new Main();
        int temp=s;
        boolean flg=true;
        int temp1;
        while(temp!=0)
        {
            temp1=temp%10;
            if(temp1!=0 && s%temp1!=0)
            {
                  flg=false;
                  break;
            }
            temp=temp/10;
        }
        if(flg==true)
            p.println("Valid");
        else
            p.println("Invalid");
        p.flush();
        }
        catch(Exception e)
        {
            
        }
}
}
